name: POPGOES Arcade: 2020 Edition
summary:
POPGOES Arcade 2020 Edition (PA2020) is a complete reboot of the original POPGOES Arcade game that was released in April 2016.

This is a brand new game, built from the ground up, that will introduce you to the world of "POPGOES: The Dead Forest", a popular arcade game that exists in The Popgoes Pizzeria. Inspiration has been taken from the original POPGOES Arcade, as well as POPGOES Arcade 2, but nothing more than that; this project is a fresh experience with brand new gameplay and a new take on the story
